::Rex/Firearm/Scavanger/Hiss::

Rex and Firearm start firing on Arcangel's command, stopping when they hear 
Prowl's transmission.

"We leave?" Rex asks Arcangel, him and Firearm holding their fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The shields of the Alliance base take most of the shots, some getting through 
to its hull, but barely damaging it. Scavanger and Hiss fly out, opening fire 
on Arcangel and SageFirestorm as the remaining defences open fire on the 
attackers.
